title: BOMB (Alpha)
description:
BOMB - Alpha

Aerial combat/missions PC game


Cool aircrafts, big guns, dogfight thrill, single player, single & multi player, modding support, moustaches and ladies. You'll like it. 

The current version contains the full single player campaign, & 2 stable multiplayers mode.

Fly around completing missions whilst shooting down your enemies.

If you liked Crimson Skies & similar games, you should have fun with this little gem.


System Requirements:

- Core 2 duo 2.4GHz or higher.
- nVidia GeForce GT 640 / ATI Radeon HD 6 series or higher.
- 3 Gig of ram or more.
- OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
- 1.1 Gig of HDD space.
